alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Traill County through 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Mayville, or 23 miles southwest of Grand Forks, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mayville, Hillsboro, Portland, Buxton, Cummings, Caledonia and Roseville. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 102 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
